articles.content: Valoranthas been the most watched game on Twitch ever since its beta started a little over three weeks ago. While most of this is from the hype over the game, its also the only way to get access to the closed beta, which means there are plenty of viewers leav… [+2193 chars]

articles.author: Samir Satam
articles.title: EA Announce Exciting News for Battlefield 6 - Essentially Sports
articles.description: EA, in a recent statement to VGC, announced some exciting news for fans regarding the release date of the upcoming title Battlefield 6.
articles.content: Last week Dice revealed they were working on the final update for Battlefield 5. The upcoming update would include new content and some tweaks and would be the last one for the title. Dice senior producer Ryan McArthur stated they were “still tackling the cha… [+2032 chars]

articles.author: Mark Spoonauer
articles.title: iPhone SE 2020 battery life is a major letdown - Tom's Guide UK
articles.description: The iPhone SE's battery life trails other phones by a significant margin based on our testing
articles.content:
The iPhone SE 2020 has a lot of things to recommend it for its $399 price, including a fast A13 Bionic processor, vibrant display and very good cameras. But battery life is not one of the new phone's strengths.
In fact, based on our battery test, the iPhone … [+3302 chars]

articles.title: UK devs are giving free games to NHS staff - Eurogamer.net
articles.content: It's a particularly tough time for frontline NHS workers right now, with services stretched and many overwhelmed with work due to the coronavirus outbreak. To help alleviate some of the stress, games companies in the UK have now launched an initiative called … [+1162 chars]

articles.title: RetroPie 4.6 brings forth an answer to 'What do I do with this Pi 4 I bought last year?' - The Register
articles.description: Fans of creaky old hardware can relive their misspent IT youth
articles.content:
Bought a Raspberry Pi 4 and left the poor thing mouldering in your gadget drawer? We have news RetroPie has unleashed version 4.6 of its popular emulator suite.

articles.content:

articles.content: BMW is in the final stages of development stage for its all-new 4 Series, a car that the manufacturer has promised will take the dynamic merits of its G20-series platform to new heights - and be spearheaded by a 374hp M440i xDrive. Sharing much of its archite… [+3287 chars]

articles.author: Aaron Brown
articles.title: Apple plans iMac and MacBook Pro redesigns: why your Mac is about to look very outdated - Express
articles.description: APPLE is hard at work on a new MacBook Pro and iMac model with slimmer bezels to bring more screen real estate, according to the latest whispers from the supply chain. Here's everything we need to know about this potentially must-have upgrade.
